questions.question: A reinforced concrete short column is considered to be under combined axial load and bending moment when:

answers.a: The load is applied exactly at the centroid of the column cross-section
answers.b: The load is applied at any point other than the centroid
answers.c: The column carries only compressive force
answers.d: The column is laterally restrained on all sides

questions.question: The strength of an RC column under combined axial load and bending moment is evaluated using:
Which reinforcement is provided to resist lateral expansion of concrete in a column?
In an RC column under combined axial load and bending, which stress distribution assumption is valid?

answers.a: Plane sections remain plane before and after bending
answers.c: Steel carries all the axial load
answers.d: Load distribution is uniform throughout the column height
